content: the willow crop top is an ultra versatile crochet sweater this oversized crop top has a lacy design with dramatic bell sleeves if long sleeves aren t your cup of tea this pattern has the option to make it into short sleeve top this sweater can easily be made to whatever length you choose whether it be a flirty crop-length or a fun full-length it s made with cotton/bamboo yarn which can be substituted for another category 3 or dk yarn making a perfect addition to your spring/summer wardrobe the pattern is written for xs-2xl however since its designed to be oversized the 2xl could be considered a fitted 3xl
